pages.text: Sausages are popular night market foods in Taiwan. Taiwanese sausages are made from pork. They have a slightly sweet flavor with crispy skin, and they are juicy as well. Some people will add Shaoxing or Gaoliang, both are a kind of alcohol, into the sausages.$(br2)Eating raw sausages restores 1 hunger, and eating grilled ones restores 3 hunger.
